page.title: 02COUNDON COUNTY J.M. SCHOOL
page.content: The junior and infants schools are in one building made of brick. It was opened on 5th November 1932. We start at the junior school when we are seven and leave when we are eleven. We have 7 teachers, 4 women and 3 men, and 194 pupils. There are 30 pupils in our class which is class 1. My teacher is Mr. Farms and the headmaster is Mr. Blenkinsopp. School starts at 9 am and ends at 3.40 every day. We do quite a lot of sports. We have swimming and P.E. once a week. We have a football and a netball team and one of the teachers is starting a cricket team. Every year we have a sports day, a swimming gala, a football and a rounders tournament. We have two dinner nannies called Mrs. Goddard and Mrs. Huygill and a caretaker called Mr. Shepherd.
